c74object.name: hoa.3d.wider~
c74object.description: hoa.3d.wider~ can be used to wide the diffusion of a localised sound. The order depending signals are weighted and appear in a logarithmic way to have linear changes.

metadatalist.metadata: Julien Colafrancesco, Pierre Guillot, Eliott Paris.

objarg.name: ambisonic-order
objarg.description: First argument is the ambisonic order of decomposition.

method.name: float
method.description: Set the widening value in the last inlet at control rate. The widening value is clipped between 0. and 1.

method.name: int
method.description: Set the widening value in the last inlet at control rate. The widening value is clipped between 0. and 1.

method.name: signal
method.digest: Array of spherical harmonics signals to be processed, widening value.
method.description: Array of spherical harmonics signals to be processed. Set the widening value in the last inlet at signal rate. The widening value is clipped between 0. and 1.
